Blog.post: Well I'm back. Sorry for no update last night, I was really worn out. We swam and stuff. We catapulted my cousin Jessie off the back of a trailer. That was pretty much it.

Well, I'm going to my aunt's for a cookout. Apparently, the pool is too dirty/filled with chemicals/my uncle is too lazy for us to swim. Knowing all of us, we'll suffer the chemical burns just for the cheap thrill of swimming. And of course, we'll play kick the can in the pool barn and I'll be hiding in the best spot ever and then I'll suddenly see a huge spider and scream "OH GOD THAT SPIDER IS HUGE" and be "it". That's how it goes. And of course my little cousin Jessie will get yelled at for some reason (like he always does). And my other cousin will start pouting because she's it, and I'll eat WAY too much, and some other funny thing will happen. Which reminds me of a story. Well, it was when I was about 9 or 10, and there was a big storm so we had to go inside. So my cousin Dan and I are sitting in some bedroom, looking out the window at some other members of my family who were outside, when my cousin Sherri (who we all used to hate for some reason) runs across the cement with her hands up, and we see this flash of lightning that looks as though it hit her. We were out for like 10 minutes cracking up. It sounds evil and mean, I know. It was.
Chech out this urlLink blog . It's really cool and funny.
Well, we ended up staying the night at the campground. Mike is talking about having the LAN party Monday, but I won't be able to make it if he does.
Well, today I'm going camping with Amanda! Woo! Sometime soon, urlLink Mike is going to have a Quake 3 LAN party at his house. I also changed my system sounds to the urlLink Homestarrunner sounds.
Well I bought some spiking glue today. Gonna get an actual picture of me up soon. Well, that's it.
Well I went to school today. That...that's about it. Nothing exciting today. Campground this weekend. Woot! Seems like a boring day, huh? Well it was. 4 more days though!
Well I have a blog now so. happy. woo. Uh...Yep.
Alright, on the 25th of June it will me and Amanda's seven month aniversary. Getting closer to a year so WOOO! Anyway thanks for taking time to read this blog. Later

Well, R.J. is back. IF you don't know who he is, I'll fill you in. R.J. is Mike's and my best bud who unfortunatley moved to Korea 4 years ago. He's back. For good. Anyway, this one time, we made this movie where R.J. was in the foreground pretending to be Britany Spears dancing on a chair. I was in the background flying across the basement on one of those office chairs with wheels. Well I smashed into the mattress that my dad slept on (he wasnt home) and was bounced up into the air. Then I landed on the arm of the chair, with one leg on either side of the chair. ouchy. It was really funny. I rode down the basement stairs on a mattresss while wearing a somberero one time. That was funny. Which reminds me of a movie urlLink Mike and I made. I'll skip to the funny part. I was wearing a Santa outfit. He was beating me over the head with my beanbag chair. I crawled to the other part of my basement, got up, grabbed a broom, and ran around behind him (my basement circles around) and yelled "You suck!" He screamed like a 6 year old girl would scream if you came out of her closet in a Freddy Krueger outfit. It was hilarious.
urlLink BEST TEACHER EVER, HERR JONES! urlLink
urlLink My other friend Mike urlLink
urlLink Me and urlLink Mike wearing book covers on our heads in German class. (Sven in background) urlLink

Sorry for not updating in a while. I've been busy with my summer. Well it's the 14th. R.J. will be back anytime now. I'm working on a new rocket and stuff. Uh, I now have a job as a "Lawn Care Specialist". I bought "Live Aus Berlin" that one live Rammstein CD. I'll try to update more, but you know how it is. I'm usually really busy in the summer doing summer stuff and whatnot. I'll post some pictures sometime. Later.

Hey, sorry about not having an update recently. I've been kind of busy. Well, school's out and I'm pretty happy about that. R.J. gets back the 14th. No real news of anything exciting. I'll update later.
WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

You want pictures? I'll give you pictures. And just a reminder, if you don't agree with anything on my site, don't come to the site. There's no reason to be here if you don't like it. And it's not like you're getting through to me, the only reason I'll be posting pictures (when I get them from urlLink Mike [I don't have the movie on my computer, he has it]) is to produce valid evidence that the incident did indeed happen, and that the scream in question was the girliest scream imaginable. In fact if I had more bandwidth and space, (and the video itself) I would post it on the site. But for now you'll just have to settle for pictures. I'll probably be taking the comments down since some people aren't mature to handle them without parental supervision.
urlLink

Well I've started to notice some odd comments on this blog so I'll just say this. If you don't agree with the things I say or do or write, then don't come back. It's not really you're problem or business what I do with my own time on my own blog. And there's nothing you can do to stop me from posting strange and unusual things each and every day. Any comment you make I'll just delete, and if you make enough I'll just turn off the comments for good. You're just like the one little kid that shoots someone in the eyes with a squirtgun, causing all the other kids to have their squirtguns taken away. And while I continue to sit here and write freely while listening to any genre of music I choose, you'll sit there in your dark room shouting "Foiled again!" because you can't do anything about it. Discarded, worthless, throw me away.! Will I tear you apart? Will it, will it tear you apart? When I turn and walk away? Looked back and...not worth the effort Stolen and chewed up, cut, scathed, and relieved Looked back and...not worth the effort You've stolen the true skin From Autumn to Ashes - The After Dinner Payback and yeah...it's death metal.
urlLink This is a picture of us taken by urlLink Mike in the line for Millenium Force.
This is the most boring part of the world. Yep. Bored. Update later.
Well I'm back from florida. I bet most of didn't even know I left. SO yea. I brought back 4 lizards and an alligator head. Woo.

Yea...I figured since i'm gonna go to bed anytime I should update real quick beforehand. I'm goin to florida in like 5 days so woo hoo for vacation. I'll have some updates soon for everyone. Meanwhile...Mike, as seen in the booksock hat picture below,is in North Carolina for a while. I'll update soon everyone. Later.

Sorry about not updating. I've been busy and stuff. I've also been really bored. I'm going to upload pictures of my cousin and Jason. Basically we stayed up until 4:30 in the morning singing stupid songs. And I painted stuff. Oh and we also threw sand-filled socks into the lake. That was great.
